definition: needlework done by interlocking looped stitches with a hooked needle, to make a piece of needlework by interlocking and looping thread with a hooked needle
details:
noun
- needlework done by interlocking looped stitches with a hooked needle
= synonyms: crocheting
verb
- to make a piece of needlework by interlocking and looping thread with a hooked needle
= example: to make a piece of needlework by interlocking and looping thread with a hooked needle
= synonyms: hook
- to create by looping or crocheting
= example: to create by looping or crocheting
